thread.section_title: ZIPtransfers opiniones | Opiniones de clientes sobre ZIPtransfers | ziptransfers.com
thread.title: I.St

author: I.St
title: I.St
text:
We ordered the service several weeks ahead and was not sure what was going to meet us when we arrived at the airport.
They had not put the sign with our name on when we arrived, but they met us with a very helpful and positive attitude.
When we was picked up at the hotel for departure, they did not contact us in advance, but came at scheduled time.
Have already booked taxi with ZIPtransfers for my next holliday!
